abstract: A different side of Fabrice P. Tourre emerged in a stint in Africa as a volunteer. | There was one number JPMorgan Chase’s chief financial officer seemed to not want to reveal. | AT&T gets back into the merger hunt. | Michael S. Dell’s fight to take Dell private is an effort to turn back the clock.
snippet: A different side of Fabrice P. Tourre emerged in a stint in Africa as a volunteer. | There was one number JPMorgan Chase’s chief financial officer seemed to not want to reveal. | AT&T gets back into the merger hunt. | Michael S. Dell’s fight to ta...
lead_paragraph: Fabrice P. Tourre is best known as Fabulous Fab, the former Goldman Sachs trader whose e-mails about the mortgage crisis became a symbol of Wall Street hubris and will now highlight the government’s case against him, Susanne Craig and Ben Protess write in DealBook. Mr. Tourre’s trial opens on Monday in a federal courtroom in Lower Manhattan.
